title: [Hall of the Arkati, Hallway]
description: A pale green and gold Loenthran runner carpets the narrow hallway from end to end.  Glaesine sconces line the wall at regular intervals, their candles snuffed for the day.  A glaes-paned door leads out into a small courtyard, barely visible through the cloudy diamond-shaped panes.

A pale green and gold Loenthran runner carpets the narrow hallway from end to end.  Glaesine sconces line the wall at regular intervals, their candles burning with an amber glow.  A glaes-paned door leads out into a small courtyard, barely visible through the cloudy diamond-shaped panes.
